## Summary

The present document is a longitudinal data analysis and modeling report. The dataset used can be obtained from [here](https://e-m-mccormick.github.io/static/longitudinal-primer/07-datasets.html). This dataset contains the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLPFC) activity meassured when adolescents (ages 11.74 - 15.33) were subjected to an executive function task. Behavioral scores on that tasks are also included. The meassurements were distributed in 4 annually waves.
